sentence.text: negative regulation of cell proliferation expression detected by QPCR, immunoblots and immunofluorescent stain, was significantly decreased in mouse corneas subjected to alkali burn-induced corneal neovascularization (CNV).

Addition of exogenous SLURP1 (6XHis-tagged, E. coli expressed and partially purified using Ni-ion columns) significantly suppressed the tumor necrosis factor-a (protein import into nucleus, translocation-a)-stimulated human umbilical cord vascular endothelial cell (HUVEC) tube formation.
